def_cn: 不合时代的事；过时现象
def_en: You say that something is an anachronism when you think that it is out of date or old-fashioned.

def_cn: 时代错误，年代误植（指所叙人、事与时代不符的错误）
def_en: An anachronism is something in a book, play, or film that is wrong because it did not exist at the time the book, play, or film is set.
